00118 /*********************************************************************************************
00119    FMB_IO_InitI 
00120 *********************************************************************************************/
00121 /* Initialization for input ('I'): */
00122 void FMB_IO_InitI(char *input_data_file){
00123 
00124   /* Initialization of 'gz_input_buf': */
00125   FMB_IO_Info.gz_input_buf = NULL;
00126   FMB_IO_Info.gz_input_buf_len = 0;
00127 
00128   /* Set 'input_data_currently_used': */
00129   if (FMB_IO_Info.input_data_currently_used){
00130     FMB_error("In FMB_IO_InitI(): the input data file is already opened.\n");
00131   }
00132   else {
00133     FMB_IO_Info.input_data_currently_used = TRUE;
00134   }
00135 
00136   /*** Save 'input_data_file': ***/
00137   if (FMB_IO_Info.input_data_filename != NULL){
00138     /* Check this is the same filename: */
00139     if (strcmp(FMB_IO_Info.input_data_filename, input_data_file) != 0){ 
00140       FMB_ERROR_BRIEF(); 
00141     }
00142   }
00143   else {
00144     FMB_IO_Info.input_data_filename = (char *) FMB_malloc_with_check((strlen(input_data_file)+1) * sizeof(char));
00145     strcpy(FMB_IO_Info.input_data_filename, input_data_file);
00146   }
00147 
00148   
00149 
00150   /*** Open 'FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data'. ***/
00151 
00152   /* Check if the input data file has NEMO file format: */
00153   if (((strstr(input_data_file, ".nemo") != NULL) || 
00154        (strstr(input_data_file, ".NEMO") != NULL) ||
00155        (FMB_IO_Info.input_format_from_cmd_line && (FMB_IO_Info.input_format == NEMO_format)))
00156       && (! (FMB_IO_Info.input_format_from_cmd_line && FMB_IO_Info.input_format != NEMO_format))){
00157     char *dummy_defv[]={ "", NULL }; /* dummy, just so that NEMO functions work... */
00158     char *dummy_argv[]={ "./bin/FMB", NULL }; /* dummy, just so that NEMO functions work... */
00159 
00160     if (FMB_IO_Info.use_decomposed_data_files){
00161       FMB_error("NEMO file format not implemented with \"FMB_IO_Info.use_decomposed_data_files == TRUE\" \n");
00162     }
00163 
00164     FMB_IO_Info.input_format = NEMO_format;
00165     initparam(dummy_argv, dummy_defv); /* 'initparam()' has to be called before NEMO I/O functions... */
00166 
00167     if ((FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data = stropen(FMB_IO_Info.input_data_filename, "r")) == NULL){
00168       FMB_error("In FMB_IO_InitI(): stropen(FMB_IO_Info.input_data_filename = %s, \"r\")",
00169                 FMB_IO_Info.input_data_filename); 
00170     }
00171 
00172     if ((FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2 = stropen(FMB_IO_Info.input_data_filename, "r")) == NULL){
00173       FMB_error("In FMB_IO_InitI(): stropen(FMB_IO_Info.input_data_filename = %s, \"r\")",
00174                 FMB_IO_Info.input_data_filename); 
00175     } 
00176     
00177     FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data_forces    = NULL;
00178   }
00179   else { /* Not the NEMO format. */
00180     
00181     if ((FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data = fopen(FMB_IO_Info.input_data_filename, "r")) == NULL){
00182       /* The data file might be compressed: */
00183       /*** zlib/gzip: we read compressed data ***/
00184       char *gzip_filename = (char *) FMB_malloc_with_check(strlen(FMB_IO_Info.input_data_filename) + 1 + GZIP_DECOMPRESSOR_LENGTH);
00185       sprintf(gzip_filename, "%s%s", FMB_IO_Info.input_data_filename, GZIP_COMPRESSION_SUFFIX);
00186 
00187       if ((FMB_IO_Info.f_input_gz_data = gzopen(gzip_filename, "r")) == NULL){
00188         /* There is no "gzipped" file. */ 
00189         /*** We look for a ".bz2" file and decompress it.
00190          * It may be better to use the "libbzip2" here, but there is no 'gets' or 'scanf' function is this lib ... */
00191         FILE *bz2_f = NULL;
00192         char *bz2_filename = (char *) FMB_malloc_with_check(strlen(FMB_IO_Info.input_data_filename) + 1 + strlen(BZIP2_COMPRESSION_SUFFIX));
00193         strcpy(bz2_filename, FMB_IO_Info.input_data_filename);
00194         strcat(bz2_filename, BZIP2_COMPRESSION_SUFFIX);
00195         if ((bz2_f = fopen(bz2_filename, "r")) != NULL){ /* just to test if the file exists */
00196           fclose(bz2_f);
00197           bunzip2_file(FMB_IO_Info.input_data_filename); /* decompress the file */
00198           if ((FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data = fopen(FMB_IO_Info.input_data_filename, "r")) == NULL){
00199             FMB_perror("fopen(%s, \"r\")", FMB_IO_Info.input_data_filename);
00200           }
00201           FMB_IO_Info.are_input_data_bzipped2 = TRUE;
00202         }
00203         else {
00204           FMB_error("Can't open file: %s{,.gz,.bz2} ", FMB_IO_Info.input_data_filename);
00205         }
00206         FMB_free(bz2_filename);
00207       }
00208       else {      
00209         //      fprintf(f_output, "File opened: %s\n", gzip_filename);
00210         FMB_IO_Info.are_input_data_gzipped = TRUE;
00211       }
00212       FMB_free(gzip_filename);
00213     }
00214     
00215     /* Check whether this is binary or ASCII FMB format: */
00216     FMB_IO_Info.FMB_binary_format_header = FMB_IO_Fread_ulong();
00217     /*     fprintf(f_output, "\t magic number = %lx \n", FMB_IO_Info.FMB_binary_format_header);  */
00218     if (FMB_IO_Info.FMB_binary_format_header == FMB_BINARY_FORMAT_MAGIC_NUMBER){
00219       FMB_IO_Info.input_format = FMB_binary_format;
00220     }
00221     else {
00222       FMB_IO_Info.input_format = FMB_ASCII_format;
00223         /* in this case, we rewind to the beginning of the file: */
00224       FMB_IO_INPUT_FSEEK(0, SEEK_SET);
00225     }
00226     
00227   } /* Not the NEMO format. */
00228 
00229   
00230   if (INFO_DISPLAY(2)){
00231     fprintf(f_output, "FMB_IO_Info.input_data_filename: %s \n", FMB_IO_Info.input_data_filename); 
00232     fprintf(f_output, "FMB_IO_Info.input_format: %s \n", FMB_IO_FORMAT_PRINTF_TEST(FMB_IO_Info.input_format)); 
00233     fprintf(f_output, "FMB_IO_Info.are_input_data_gzipped = %s \n", (FMB_IO_Info.are_input_data_gzipped ? "TRUE" : "FALSE"));
00234     fprintf(f_output, "FMB_IO_Info.are_input_data_bzipped2 = %s \n", (FMB_IO_Info.are_input_data_bzipped2 ? "TRUE" : "FALSE"));
00235   }
00236 }
00237

00242 /*********************************************************************************************
00243    FMB_IO_TerminateI 
00244 *********************************************************************************************/
00245 /* Termination for input ('I'): */
00246 void FMB_IO_TerminateI(){
00247 
00248   switch(FMB_IO_Info.input_format){
00249 
00250   case FMB_ASCII_format:
00251   case FMB_binary_format:
00252     /* Close 'FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data'. */
00253     if (FMB_IO_Info.are_input_data_gzipped){
00254       if (gzclose(FMB_IO_Info.f_input_gz_data) == Z_ERRNO /* we test here only "system" errors (not "zlib" ones) */){
00255         FMB_perror("gzclose(FMB_IO_Info.f_input_gz_data=%s)", FMB_IO_Info.f_input_gz_data); 
00256       }
00257       FMB_IO_Info.f_input_gz_data = NULL;
00258     }
00259     else {
00260       if (fclose(FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data) == EOF){ 
00261         FMB_error("fclose(FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data=%s)", FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data); 
00262       }
00263       FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data = NULL;
00264     }
00265     
00266     /* Free the buffer used for gzipped file read: */  
00267     if (FMB_IO_Info.gz_input_buf != NULL){
00268       FMB_free(FMB_IO_Info.gz_input_buf);
00269     FMB_IO_Info.gz_input_buf = NULL;
00270     }
00271     
00272     break;
00273     
00274   case NEMO_format:
00275 
00276     /* Close 'FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data': */
00277     get_data_tes((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data, "Mass");
00278     get_tes((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data, "Particles"); 
00279     get_tes((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data, "SnapShot");
00280     strclose((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data);
00281     
00282     /* Close 'FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2' (and 'FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data3' if necessary): */
00283     if (FMB_IO_Info.use_PhaseSpace_in_input){
00284       get_data_tes((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2, "PhaseSpace");
00285     }
00286     else {
00287       get_data_tes((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2, "Position");
00288       if (FMB_IO_Info.is_Velocity_present_in_input){
00289         get_data_tes((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data3, "Velocity");
00290       }
00291     }
00292     get_tes((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2, "Particles"); 
00293     get_tes((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2, "SnapShot");
00294     strclose((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2);
00295     if ((! FMB_IO_Info.use_PhaseSpace_in_input) && (FMB_IO_Info.is_Velocity_present_in_input)){
00296       get_tes((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data3, "Particles"); 
00297       get_tes((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data3, "SnapShot");
00298       strclose((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data3);
00299     }
00300 
00301     /* Close 'FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data_forces' (if necessary): */
00302     if (FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data_forces != NULL){
00303       get_data_tes((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data_forces, "Acceleration");
00304       get_tes((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data_forces, "Particles"); 
00305       get_tes((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data_forces, "SnapShot");
00306       strclose((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data_forces);
00307     }
00308 
00309     break;
00310     
00311   default:
00312     FMB_error("In FMB_IO_TerminateI(): unknow file format.\n");
00313   }
00314 
00315   /* Release 'input_data_currently_used': */
00316   FMB_IO_Info.input_data_currently_used = FALSE;
00317 }
00318

00323 /*********************************************************************************************
00324    FMB_IO_InitO 
00325 *********************************************************************************************/
00326 /* Initialization for output ('O'): */
00327 void FMB_IO_InitO(char *output_data_file){
00328 
00329   /* Set 'output_data_currently_used': */
00330   if (FMB_IO_Info.output_data_currently_used){
00331     FMB_error("In FMB_IO_InitO(): the output data file is already opened.\n");
00332   }
00333   else {
00334     FMB_IO_Info.output_data_currently_used = TRUE;
00335   }
00336 
00337   /* We use the same as for input data files (unless the "--ot" option has been used): */ 
00338   if (! FMB_IO_Info.output_format_from_cmd_line){
00339     FMB_IO_Info.output_format                 = FMB_IO_Info.input_format ;
00340   }
00341   if ((FMB_IO_Info.output_format == FMB_ASCII_format) || 
00342       (FMB_IO_Info.output_format == FMB_ASCII_human_format)){
00343     FMB_IO_Info.are_output_data_gzipped       = TRUE; /* default with FMB_ASCII_format and FMB_ASCII_human_format */
00344   }
00345 
00346   if (FMB_IO_Info.output_format == NEMO_format){
00347     FMB_IO_Info.use_PhaseSpace_in_output      = FMB_IO_Info.use_PhaseSpace_in_input ;
00348     FMB_IO_Info.is_Velocity_present_in_output = FMB_IO_Info.is_Velocity_present_in_input ;
00349   }
00350 
00351   /* We use 'COORDINATES_T' for 'FMB_IO_Info.is_output_coord_float': */
00352   if (sizeof(COORDINATES_T) == sizeof(float)){
00353     FMB_IO_Info.is_output_coord_float = TRUE;
00354   }
00355   else {
00356     if (sizeof(COORDINATES_T) == sizeof(double)){
00357       FMB_IO_Info.is_output_coord_float = FALSE;
00358     }
00359     else {
00360       FMB_ERROR_BRIEF();
00361     }
00362   }
00363 
00364   FMB_IO_Info.output_data_filename = (char *) FMB_malloc_with_check((strlen(output_data_file) 
00365                                                                      + 1 /* terminating '\0' */ 
00366                                                                      + GZIP_COMPRESSION_SUFFIX_LENGTH /* only useful if (FMB_IO_Info.are_output_data_gzipped) */
00367                                                                      + NEMO_SUFFIX_LENGTH /* only for NEMO format */) * sizeof(char));
00368   strcpy(FMB_IO_Info.output_data_filename, output_data_file);
00369   
00370   
00371   /* NEMO format: */
00372   if (FMB_IO_Info.output_format == NEMO_format){
00373     strcat(FMB_IO_Info.output_data_filename, ".nemo");
00374 
00375     if ((FMB_IO_Info.f_output_data = stropen(FMB_IO_Info.output_data_filename, "w+")) == NULL){
00376       FMB_error("In FMB_IO_InitO(): stropen(FMB_IO_Info.output_data_filename = %s, \"w+\")",
00377                 FMB_IO_Info.output_data_filename); 
00378     } 
00379   }
00380   else { /* Not the NEMO format. */
00381   
00382     if (! FMB_IO_Info.are_output_data_gzipped){
00383       if ((FMB_IO_Info.f_output_data = fopen(FMB_IO_Info.output_data_filename, "w")) == NULL)
00384         FMB_perror("fopen(%s, \"w\")", FMB_IO_Info.output_data_filename); 
00385     }
00386     else {
00387       sprintf(FMB_IO_Info.output_data_filename, "%s%s", FMB_IO_Info.output_data_filename, GZIP_COMPRESSION_SUFFIX);
00388       if ((FMB_IO_Info.f_output_gz_data = gzopen(FMB_IO_Info.output_data_filename, "w")) == NULL){
00389         FMB_perror("gzopen(%s, \"w\")", FMB_IO_Info.output_data_filename); 
00390       }
00391     }
00392 
00393     
00394     /* Check for "FMB binary format" that COORDINATES_T and VALUES_T have the same type 
00395      * (either float or double): */
00396     if (FMB_IO_Info.output_format == FMB_binary_format){
00397       if (! ((sizeof(COORDINATES_T) == sizeof(float) && 
00398              sizeof(VALUES_T)      == sizeof(float)) ||
00399              (sizeof(COORDINATES_T) == sizeof(double) && 
00400               sizeof(VALUES_T)      == sizeof(double)))){
00401         FMB_error("In FMB_IO_InitO(): in order to write output files with \"FMB binary format\", the types 'COORDINATES_T' and 'VALUES_T' should all be 'float' or all 'double'.\n");
00402       }
00403     }    
00404     
00405   } /* Not the NEMO format */
00406   
00407   if (INFO_DISPLAY(2)){
00408     fprintf(f_output, "FMB_IO_Info.output_data_filename: %s \n", FMB_IO_Info.output_data_filename); 
00409     fprintf(f_output, "FMB_IO_Info.output_format: %s \n", FMB_IO_FORMAT_PRINTF_TEST(FMB_IO_Info.output_format)); 
00410     fprintf(f_output, "FMB_IO_Info.are_output_data_gzipped = %s \n", (FMB_IO_Info.are_output_data_gzipped ? "TRUE" : "FALSE"));
00411     fprintf(f_output, "FMB_IO_Info.are_output_data_bzipped2 = %s \n", (FMB_IO_Info.are_output_data_bzipped2 ? "TRUE" : "FALSE"));
00412     
00413     if (FMB_IO_Info.output_format == NEMO_format){
00414       fprintf(f_output, "FMB_IO_Info.use_PhaseSpace_in_output = %s \n", (FMB_IO_Info.use_PhaseSpace_in_output ? "TRUE" : "FALSE"));
00415       if (! FMB_IO_Info.use_PhaseSpace_in_output){
00416         fprintf(f_output, "FMB_IO_Info.is_Velocity_present_in_output = %s \n", (FMB_IO_Info.is_Velocity_present_in_output ? "TRUE" : "FALSE"));
00417       }
00418       fprintf(f_output, "FMB_IO_Info.is_output_coord_float = %s \n", (FMB_IO_Info.is_output_coord_float ? "TRUE" : "FALSE"));
00419     }
00420   } /* if (INFO_DISPLAY(2)) */
00421 }
00422

00424 
00425 /*********************************************************************************************
00426    FMB_IO_TerminateO
00427 *********************************************************************************************/
00428 /* Termination for output ('O'): */
00429 void FMB_IO_TerminateO(){
00430 
00431   if (FMB_IO_Info.output_format != NEMO_format){
00432     if (! FMB_IO_Info.are_output_data_gzipped){
00433       if (fclose(FMB_IO_Info.f_output_data) == EOF){ FMB_perror("fclose(FMB_IO_Info.f_output_data)"); }
00434 
00435       if (FMB_IO_Info.output_format == FMB_ASCII_human_format){
00436         /***** Sort the "results" file: *****/
00437         {
00438           char * commande = FMB_malloc_with_check( (2*strlen(FMB_IO_Info.output_data_filename) + 30) * sizeof(char));
00439           sprintf(commande, SORT_COMMANDE_FORMAT, FMB_IO_Info.output_data_filename, FMB_IO_Info.output_data_filename);
00440           if (INFO_DISPLAY(1)){
00441             fprintf(f_output, "Sorting the \"results file\" ... "); 
00442             fflush(f_output);
00443           }
00444           if (system(commande) == -1)
00445             FMB_perror("system(sort ...)");
00446           if (INFO_DISPLAY(1)){
00447             fprintf(f_output, "done.\n");
00448           }
00449           FMB_free(commande);
00450         }
00451       } /* if (FMB_IO_Info.output_format == FMB_ASCII_human_format) */
00452     } /* if (! FMB_IO_Info.are_data_gzipped) */
00453     else {
00454       if (gzclose(FMB_IO_Info.f_output_gz_data) == Z_ERRNO /* we test here only "system" errors (not "zlib" ones) */){ FMB_perror("gzclose(FMB_IO_Info.f_output_gz_data=%s)", FMB_IO_Info.f_output_gz_data); }
00455       /* no sorting of compressed "results" file ... */
00456     } /* else (! FMB_IO_Info.are_data_gzipped) */ 
00457   } /* if (FMB_IO_Info.output_format != NEMO_format) */
00458 
00459   /* Release 'output_data_currently_used': */
00460   FMB_IO_Info.output_data_currently_used = FALSE;
00461 
00462   /***** Free memory: *****/
00463   FMB_free(FMB_IO_Info.output_data_filename);
00464   FMB_IO_Info.output_data_filename = NULL;
00465 }
00466 
00467 
00468 
00469 
00470 
00471 
00472 
00473 
00474 /*********************************************************************************************
00475    FMB_IO_Set_NEMO_coord_float
00476 *********************************************************************************************/
00477 /* This auxiliary function is used only for NEMO snapshots in order to detect 
00478  * whether the NEMO file contains 'float' or 'double' numbers. */
00479 void FMB_IO_Set_NEMO_coord_float(FILE *str /* stream */, 
00480                                  char *tag, 
00481                                  bool *p_coord_float /* output parameter */){
00482   
00483   char *tmp_string = get_type((stream) str, tag);
00484   if (strcmp("f", tmp_string) == 0){
00485     *p_coord_float = TRUE;
00486   }
00487   else {
00488     if (strcmp("d", tmp_string) == 0){
00489       *p_coord_float = FALSE;
00490     }
00491     else {
00492       FMB_error("In FMB_IO_Set_NEMO_coord_float(): unknow type (neither \"f\" nor \"d\") for stream=%s and tag=%s \n",
00493                 str, tag);
00494     }
00495   }
00496   free(tmp_string); /* not allocated by 'FMB_malloc()' so I prefer to use 'free()' instead of 'FMB_free()' */
00497 }
00498 
00499 
00500 
00501 
00502 
00503 
00504 
00505 
00506 /*********************************************************************************************
00507    FMB_IO_Scan_header
00508 *********************************************************************************************/
00509 /* This functions sets 'FMB_Indo.nb_bodies', '*p_center' and '*p_half_side'. 
00510  * If 'p_center' or 'p_half_side' are NULL, we do not compute them for NEMO format 
00511  * (but we still have to read them from the file for FMB format 
00512  * (otherwise the stream is not correctly set afterwards)). */
00513 void FMB_IO_Scan_header(bodies_ind_t *p_nb_bodies,
00514                         position_t *p_center, 
00515                         COORDINATES_T *p_half_side){
00516   bodies_ind_t nb_bodies;
00517   position_t center;
00518   COORDINATES_T half_side;
00519 
00520   if (! FMB_IO_Info.input_data_currently_used){
00521     FMB_error("In FMB_IO_Header(): FMB_IO_InitI() has not been called first...\n");
00522   }
00523 
00524   switch (FMB_IO_Info.input_format){
00525     
00526   case FMB_ASCII_format:
00527     
00528     FMB_IO_FSCANF(100 /* for safety */, "%li\n", &nb_bodies);
00529 
00530     FMB_IO_FSCANF(NB_BYTES__FOR__NO_PRECISION_DOUBLE_FSCANF_X4, NO_PRECISION_DOUBLE_FSCANF_X4, 
00531                   &half_side,
00532                   position_Get_p_x(&center), 
00533                   position_Get_p_y(&center),
00534                   position_Get_p_z(&center));
00535 
00536 
00537     /*** We now use the lowest power of 2 that encloses all particles: ***/
00538     half_side = FMB_POW(2.0, FMB_CEIL(FMB_LOG2(half_side))); 
00539 
00540     break;
00541 
00542   case FMB_binary_format:
00543     
00544     /* Retrieve the "FMB binary format header": */
00545     FMB_IO_Info.FMB_binary_format_header = FMB_IO_Fread_ulong();
00546     if (INFO_DISPLAY(2)){
00547       fprintf(f_output, "FMB binary format header info: header = %lx\n", FMB_IO_Info.FMB_binary_format_header);
00548       if (FMB_BINARY_FORMAT_HEADER_IS_THE_BIT_SET(FMB_IO_Info.FMB_binary_format_header, FMB_BINARY_FORMAT_HEADER_FLOAT_DATA_BIT)){
00549         fprintf(f_output, "\t - data are 'float'\n");  
00550       }
00551       if (FMB_BINARY_FORMAT_HEADER_IS_THE_BIT_SET(FMB_IO_Info.FMB_binary_format_header, FMB_BINARY_FORMAT_HEADER_POSITION_PRESENCE_BIT)){
00552         fprintf(f_output, "\t - 'position' is present\n");  
00553       }
00554       if (FMB_BINARY_FORMAT_HEADER_IS_THE_BIT_SET(FMB_IO_Info.FMB_binary_format_header, FMB_BINARY_FORMAT_HEADER_VALUE_PRESENCE_BIT)){
00555         fprintf(f_output, "\t - 'value' is present\n");  
00556       }
00557       if (FMB_BINARY_FORMAT_HEADER_IS_THE_BIT_SET(FMB_IO_Info.FMB_binary_format_header, FMB_BINARY_FORMAT_HEADER_POTENTIAL_PRESENCE_BIT)){
00558         fprintf(f_output, "\t - 'potential' is present\n");  
00559       }
00560       if (FMB_BINARY_FORMAT_HEADER_IS_THE_BIT_SET(FMB_IO_Info.FMB_binary_format_header, FMB_BINARY_FORMAT_HEADER_FORCE_PRESENCE_BIT)){
00561         fprintf(f_output, "\t - 'force' is present\n");  
00562       }
00563       if (FMB_BINARY_FORMAT_HEADER_IS_THE_BIT_SET(FMB_IO_Info.FMB_binary_format_header, FMB_BINARY_FORMAT_HEADER_SPEED_PRESENCE_BIT)){
00564         fprintf(f_output, "\t - 'speed' is present\n");  
00565       }
00566     }
00567       
00568     nb_bodies = FMB_IO_FREAD_BODIES_IND();
00569 
00570     half_side = FMB_IO_FREAD_COORDINATE(); 
00571     position_Set_x(&center, FMB_IO_FREAD_COORDINATE());
00572     position_Set_y(&center, FMB_IO_FREAD_COORDINATE());
00573     position_Set_z(&center, FMB_IO_FREAD_COORDINATE());
00574 
00575 
00576     /*** We now use the lowest power of 2 that encloses all particles: ***/
00577     half_side = FMB_POW(2.0, FMB_CEIL(FMB_LOG2(half_side))); 
00578 
00579     break;
00580 
00581   case NEMO_format:{
00582     
00583     /* We have here to browse the whole file to determine the position and coordinates 
00584      * of the computational box => this may be quite slow ...
00585      * Remark: in the 'treecode' for example, they do the same, but all particles are 
00586      * already stored in a single array (and this is therefore much faster than browsing the 
00587      * file).
00588      * For FMB, I prefer longer 'octree construction' time than greater memory requirements. */
00589     
00590     /*     double unused; */
00591     int nobj=0, n=0;
00592     COORDINATES_T x_min=0.0, y_min=0.0, z_min=0.0;
00593     COORDINATES_T x_max=0.0, y_max=0.0, z_max=0.0;
00594     COORDINATES_T x_side=0.0, y_side=0.0, z_side=0.0, side=0.0;
00595     
00596     get_history((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data);
00597     ask_history();
00598         
00599     get_set((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data, "SnapShot");
00600 
00601     get_set((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data, "Parameters");
00602     /*     get_data_coerced((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data, "Time", "d" /\* DoubleType *\/, &unused, 0); */
00603     get_data((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data, "Nobj", "i" /* IntType */, &nobj, 0);
00604     nb_bodies = (bodies_ind_t) nobj;
00605     get_tes((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data,"Parameters");
00606 
00607 
00608 
00609     get_set((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data, "Particles"); 
00610     if (get_tag_ok((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data, "PhaseSpace")){
00611       FMB_IO_Info.use_PhaseSpace_in_input = TRUE;
00612       FMB_IO_Set_NEMO_coord_float(FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data, "PhaseSpace", &FMB_IO_Info.is_input_coord_float); 
00613       get_data_set((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data, "PhaseSpace", (FMB_IO_Info.is_input_coord_float ? "f" : "d"), nb_bodies, 2, 3, 0); 
00614     }
00615     else {
00616       FMB_IO_Info.use_PhaseSpace_in_input = FALSE;
00617       
00618       /* Set 'FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data' to 'Position': */
00619       if (get_tag_ok((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data, "Position")){
00620         FMB_IO_Set_NEMO_coord_float(FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data, "Position", &FMB_IO_Info.is_input_coord_float);
00621         get_data_set((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data, "Position", (FMB_IO_Info.is_input_coord_float ? "f" : "d"), nb_bodies, 1, 3, 0); 
00622       }
00623       else {
00624         FMB_error("In FMB_IO_Header(): item \'Position\' not found.\n");
00625       }
00626 
00627       /* Set 'FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2' to 'Velocity' if necessary: */
00628       if (get_tag_ok((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2, "Velocity")){
00629         bool is_Velocity_float = FALSE;
00630         
00631         FMB_IO_Info.is_Velocity_present_in_input = TRUE;
00632         get_history((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2);
00633         ask_history();
00634         get_set((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2, "SnapShot");
00635         get_set((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2, "Parameters");
00636         /*      get_data_coerced((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2, "Time", "d" /\* DoubleType *\/, &unused, 0); */
00637         get_data((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2, "Nobj", "i" /* IntType */, &nobj, 0);
00638         get_tes((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2,"Parameters");
00639         get_set((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2, "Particles"); 
00640         
00641         FMB_IO_Set_NEMO_coord_float(FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2, "Velocity", &is_Velocity_float);
00642         if (is_Velocity_float != FMB_IO_Info.is_input_coord_float){
00643           FMB_ERROR_BRIEF(); /* for now, I assume that "Position" and "Velocity" have the same precision (float or double), 
00644                               * but this can be changed */
00645         }
00646         get_data_set((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2, "Velocity", (FMB_IO_Info.is_input_coord_float ? "f" : "d"), nb_bodies, 1, 3, 0);       
00647       }
00648       else {
00649         FMB_IO_Info.is_Velocity_present_in_input = FALSE;
00650       }
00651     }
00652 
00653     if (INFO_DISPLAY(2)){
00654       fprintf(f_output, "FMB_IO_Info.use_PhaseSpace_in_input = %s \n", (FMB_IO_Info.use_PhaseSpace_in_input ? "TRUE" : "FALSE"));
00655       if (! FMB_IO_Info.use_PhaseSpace_in_input){
00656         fprintf(f_output, "FMB_IO_Info.is_Velocity_present_in_input = %s \n", (FMB_IO_Info.is_Velocity_present_in_input ? "TRUE" : "FALSE"));
00657       }
00658       fprintf(f_output, "FMB_IO_Info.is_input_coord_float = %s \n", (FMB_IO_Info.is_input_coord_float ? "TRUE" : "FALSE"));
00659     }
00660 
00661     
00662     /* Check: */
00663     if (sizeof(position_t) != 3 * sizeof(COORDINATES_T)){ FMB_ERROR_BRIEF(); }
00664       
00665     if ((p_center != NULL) || (p_half_side != NULL)){
00666       for (n=0; n<nb_bodies; ++n){ 
00667         float  xf = 0.0, yf = 0.0, zf = 0.0;
00668         double xd = 0.0, yd = 0.0, zd = 0.0;
00669         float  xuf = 0.0, yuf = 0.0, zuf = 0.0; /* unused (velocity) */
00670         double xud = 0.0, yud = 0.0, zud = 0.0; /* unused (velocity) */
00671         position_t pos_tmp;
00672         
00673         if (FMB_IO_Info.use_PhaseSpace_in_input){
00674           if (FMB_IO_Info.is_input_coord_float){
00675             get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data, "PhaseSpace", &xf, 1); 
00676             get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data, "PhaseSpace", &yf, 1); 
00677             get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data, "PhaseSpace", &zf, 1); 
00678             get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data, "PhaseSpace", &xuf, 1);
00679             get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data, "PhaseSpace", &yuf, 1);
00680             get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data, "PhaseSpace", &zuf, 1);
00681           }
00682           else {
00683             get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data, "PhaseSpace", &xd, 1); 
00684             get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data, "PhaseSpace", &yd, 1); 
00685             get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data, "PhaseSpace", &zd, 1); 
00686             get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data, "PhaseSpace", &xud, 1);
00687             get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data, "PhaseSpace", &yud, 1);
00688             get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data, "PhaseSpace", &zud, 1);
00689           }
00690         }
00691         else {
00692           if (FMB_IO_Info.is_input_coord_float){
00693             get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data,  "Position", &xf, 1); 
00694             get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data,  "Position", &yf, 1); 
00695             get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data,  "Position", &zf, 1); 
00696             if (FMB_IO_Info.is_Velocity_present_in_input){
00697               get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2, "Velocity", &xuf, 1); 
00698               get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2, "Velocity", &yuf, 1); 
00699               get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2, "Velocity", &zuf, 1); 
00700             }
00701           }
00702           else {
00703             get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data,  "Position", &xd, 1); 
00704             get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data,  "Position", &yd, 1); 
00705             get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data,  "Position", &zd, 1); 
00706             if (FMB_IO_Info.is_Velocity_present_in_input){
00707               get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2, "Velocity", &xud, 1); 
00708               get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2, "Velocity", &yud, 1); 
00709               get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2, "Velocity", &zud, 1); 
00710             }
00711           }
00712         }
00713 
00714         /* Convert (if necessary) float/double to COORDINATES_T: */
00715         if (FMB_IO_Info.is_input_coord_float){
00716           position_Set_x(&pos_tmp, (COORDINATES_T) xf);
00717           position_Set_y(&pos_tmp, (COORDINATES_T) yf);
00718           position_Set_z(&pos_tmp, (COORDINATES_T) zf);   
00719         }
00720         else {
00721           position_Set_x(&pos_tmp, (COORDINATES_T) xd);
00722           position_Set_y(&pos_tmp, (COORDINATES_T) yd);
00723           position_Set_z(&pos_tmp, (COORDINATES_T) zd);   
00724         }
00725         
00726 
00727         if (n == 0){
00728           x_min = position_Get_x(&pos_tmp); 
00729           y_min = position_Get_y(&pos_tmp);  
00730           z_min = position_Get_z(&pos_tmp);     
00731           
00732           x_max = position_Get_x(&pos_tmp); 
00733           y_max = position_Get_y(&pos_tmp); 
00734           z_max = position_Get_z(&pos_tmp); 
00735         }
00736         else { /* if (n == 0) */ 
00737           if (position_Get_x(&pos_tmp) < x_min){ x_min = position_Get_x(&pos_tmp); } 
00738           if (position_Get_y(&pos_tmp) < y_min){ y_min = position_Get_y(&pos_tmp); } 
00739           if (position_Get_z(&pos_tmp) < z_min){ z_min = position_Get_z(&pos_tmp); } 
00740           
00741           if (position_Get_x(&pos_tmp) > x_max){ x_max = position_Get_x(&pos_tmp); } 
00742           if (position_Get_y(&pos_tmp) > y_max){ y_max = position_Get_y(&pos_tmp); } 
00743           if (position_Get_z(&pos_tmp) > z_max){ z_max = position_Get_z(&pos_tmp); } 
00744         } /* else (n == 0) */
00745         
00746         
00747         /*** For debugging: ***/
00748 /*      fprintf(f_output, " pos_tmp = "); */
00749 /*      position_Display(&pos_tmp, f_output, high); */
00750 /*      fprintf(f_output, " \n"); */
00751 /*      fprintf(f_output, "x_min = %f, y_min = %f, z_min = %f\n", x_min, y_min, z_min); */
00752 /*      fprintf(f_output, "x_max = %f, y_max = %f, z_max = %f\n", x_max, y_max, z_max); */
00753       } /* for n */
00754     } /* if ((p_center != NULL) || (p_half_side != NULL)) */
00755 
00756     if (FMB_IO_Info.use_PhaseSpace_in_input){
00757       get_data_tes((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data, "PhaseSpace");
00758     } /* if (FMB_IO_Info.use_PhaseSpace_in_input) */
00759     else {
00760       get_data_tes((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data, "Position");
00761       if (FMB_IO_Info.is_Velocity_present_in_input){
00762         get_data_tes((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2, "Velocity");
00763       }
00764     } /* else (FMB_IO_Info.use_PhaseSpace_in_input) */
00765 
00766     /* Close 'FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data': */
00767     get_tes((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data, "Particles"); 
00768     get_tes((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data, "SnapShot");
00769     strclose((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data);
00770     
00771     /* We reopen the "stream" for future calls to FMB_IO_Scan_body(): */
00772     if ((FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data = stropen(FMB_IO_Info.input_data_filename, "r")) == NULL){
00773       FMB_error("In FMB_IO_Scan_header(): stropen(FMB_IO_Info.input_data_filename = %s, \"r\")",
00774                 FMB_IO_Info.input_data_filename); 
00775     }  
00776 
00777     /* Close and reopen 'FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2' if necessary: */
00778     if ((! FMB_IO_Info.use_PhaseSpace_in_input) && (FMB_IO_Info.is_Velocity_present_in_input)){
00779       get_tes((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2, "Particles"); 
00780       get_tes((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2, "SnapShot");
00781       strclose((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2);
00782     
00783       /* We reopen the "stream" for future calls to FMB_IO_Scan_body(): */
00784       if ((FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2 = stropen(FMB_IO_Info.input_data_filename, "r")) == NULL){
00785         FMB_error("In FMB_IO_Scan_header(): stropen(FMB_IO_Info.input_data_filename = %s, \"r\")",
00786                   FMB_IO_Info.input_data_filename); 
00787       }  
00788     }
00789 
00790 
00791     if ((p_center != NULL) || (p_half_side != NULL)){
00792       /* We try first to round the 'x_min' and 'x_max' values only if 
00793        * the difference to the floor/ceil is below 1%:  */
00794       COORDINATES_T x_min_floor = FMB_FLOOR(x_min);
00795       COORDINATES_T y_min_floor = FMB_FLOOR(y_min);
00796       COORDINATES_T z_min_floor = FMB_FLOOR(z_min);
00797       COORDINATES_T x_max_ceil  = FMB_CEIL(x_max);
00798       COORDINATES_T y_max_ceil  = FMB_CEIL(y_max);
00799       COORDINATES_T z_max_ceil  = FMB_CEIL(z_max);
00800       if (FMB_FABS((x_min - x_min_floor) / x_min_floor) < (COORDINATES_T) 0.01){ x_min = x_min_floor ; }
00801       if (FMB_FABS((y_min - y_min_floor) / y_min_floor) < (COORDINATES_T) 0.01){ y_min = y_min_floor ; }
00802       if (FMB_FABS((z_min - z_min_floor) / z_min_floor) < (COORDINATES_T) 0.01){ z_min = z_min_floor ; }
00803       if (FMB_FABS((x_max_ceil - x_max) / x_max_ceil) < (COORDINATES_T) 0.01){   x_max = x_max_ceil  ; }
00804       if (FMB_FABS((y_max_ceil - y_max) / y_max_ceil) < (COORDINATES_T) 0.01){   y_max = y_max_ceil  ; }
00805       if (FMB_FABS((z_max_ceil - z_max) / z_max_ceil) < (COORDINATES_T) 0.01){   z_max = z_max_ceil  ; }
00806 
00807       /* Compute the side of the computational box: */
00808       /*       fprintf(f_output, "x_min = %f, y_min = %f, z_min = %f \n", x_min, y_min, z_min); */
00809       /*       fprintf(f_output, "x_max = %f, y_max = %f, z_max = %f \n", x_max, y_max, z_max); */
00810       x_side = x_max - x_min;
00811       y_side = y_max - y_min;
00812       z_side = z_max - z_min;
00813       side = MAX(y_side, z_side);
00814       side = MAX(side, x_side);
00815       /*       fprintf(f_output, "side = %f \n", side); */
00816       side = FMB_POW(2.0, FMB_CEIL(FMB_LOG2(side))); /* we use the lowest power of 2 that encloses all particles  */
00817       /*       fprintf(f_output, "side = %f \n", side); */
00818 
00819       /* Compute half side: */
00820       half_side = side * 0.5;
00821       
00822       /* Compute center coordinates: we use the average position between (x_min, y_min, z_min) and (x_max, y_max, z_max). */
00823       position_Set_x(&center, (x_max + x_min) / 2);
00824       position_Set_y(&center, (y_max + y_min) / 2);
00825       position_Set_z(&center, (z_max + z_min) / 2);
00826     }
00827 
00828     
00829     /*** We set the two (or three) streams for future calls to FMB_IO_Scan_body(): ***/
00830     
00831     /* Set stream #1 for mass: */
00832     get_history((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data);
00833     ask_history();
00834     get_set((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data, "SnapShot");
00835     get_set((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data, "Parameters");
00836     /*     get_data_coerced((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data, "Time", "d" /\* DoubleType *\/, &unused, 0); */
00837     get_data((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data, "Nobj", "i" /* IntType */, &nobj, 0);
00838     get_tes((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data,"Parameters");
00839     get_set((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data, "Particles"); 
00840     { /* Check for precision used for "Mass": */
00841       bool is_Mass_float = FALSE;
00842       FMB_IO_Set_NEMO_coord_float(FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data, "Mass", &is_Mass_float);
00843       if (is_Mass_float != FMB_IO_Info.is_input_coord_float){
00844         FMB_ERROR_BRIEF(); /* for now, I assume that "Mass" has the same precision (float or double) 
00845                             * as "PhaseSpace" (or "Position" and "Velocity"), but this can be changed */
00846       }
00847     }
00848     get_data_set((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data, "Mass", (FMB_IO_Info.is_input_coord_float ? "f" : "d"), nb_bodies, 0);
00849 
00850     
00851     /* Set stream #2 for PhaseSpace (or stream #2 and #3 for Position and Velocity): */
00852     get_history((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2);
00853     ask_history();
00854     get_set((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2, "SnapShot");
00855     get_set((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2, "Parameters");
00856     /*     get_data_coerced((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2, "Time", "d" /\* DoubleType *\/, &unused, 0); */
00857     get_data((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2, "Nobj", "i" /* IntType */, &nobj, 0);
00858     get_tes((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2,"Parameters");
00859     get_set((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2, "Particles"); 
00860     
00861     if (FMB_IO_Info.use_PhaseSpace_in_input){
00862       get_data_set((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2, "PhaseSpace", (FMB_IO_Info.is_input_coord_float ? "f" : "d"), nb_bodies, 2, 3, 0); 
00863     }
00864     else {
00865       /* Set 'FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2' to 'Position': */
00866       get_data_set((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2, "Position", (FMB_IO_Info.is_input_coord_float ? "f" : "d"), nb_bodies, 1, 3, 0); 
00867       
00868       /* Open and set 'FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data3' to 'Velocity': */
00869       if (FMB_IO_Info.is_Velocity_present_in_input){
00870         if ((FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data3 = stropen(FMB_IO_Info.input_data_filename, "r")) == NULL){
00871           FMB_error("In FMB_IO_Scan_header(): stropen(FMB_IO_Info.input_data_filename = %s, \"r\")",
00872                     FMB_IO_Info.input_data_filename); 
00873         }        
00874         get_history((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data3);
00875         ask_history();
00876         get_set((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data3, "SnapShot");
00877         get_set((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data3, "Parameters");
00878         /*      get_data_coerced((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data3, "Time", "d" /\* DoubleType *\/, &unused, 0); */
00879         get_data((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data3, "Nobj", "i" /* IntType */, &nobj, 0);
00880         get_tes((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data3,"Parameters");
00881         get_set((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data3, "Particles"); 
00882         get_data_set((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data3, "Velocity", (FMB_IO_Info.is_input_coord_float ? "f" : "d"), nb_bodies, 1, 3, 0);       
00883       }
00884     }
00885 
00886 #if 0 
00887     /* Set stream for forces (accelerations) (if they are present): */
00888     if ((FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data_forces = stropen(FMB_IO_Info.input_data_filename, "r")) == NULL){
00889       FMB_error("In FMB_IO_Scan_header(): stropen(FMB_IO_Info.input_data_filename = %s, \"r\")",
00890                 FMB_IO_Info.input_data_filename); 
00891     }  
00892     get_history((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data_forces);
00893     ask_history();
00894     get_set((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data_forces, "SnapShot");
00895     get_set((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data_forces, "Particles"); 
00896     if (get_tag_ok((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data_forces, "Acceleration")){
00897       get_data_set((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data_forces, "Acceleration", (FMB_IO_Info.is_input_coord_float ? "f" : "d"), nb_bodies, 1, 3, 0);       
00898       if (INFO_DISPLAY(2)){
00899         fprintf(f_output, " 'Acceleration' found in snapshot.\n");
00900       }
00901     } 
00902     else {
00903       get_tes((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data_forces, "Particles"); 
00904       get_tes((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data_forces, "SnapShot");
00905       strclose((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data_forces);
00906       FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data_forces = NULL;
00907     }
00908 #endif 
00909 
00910     break;
00911   }
00912   default:
00913     FMB_error("In FMB_IO_Header(): unknow file format.\n");
00914   }
00915 
00916   if (INFO_DISPLAY(2)){
00917     fprintf(f_output, " FMB_IO_Header(): half_side = %e \n", half_side);     
00918     fprintf(f_output, " FMB_IO_Header(): center = ");
00919     position_Display(&center, f_output, high);
00920     fprintf(f_output, " \n");
00921   }
00922 
00923   /* Set 'out' parameters: */
00924   *p_nb_bodies = nb_bodies;
00925   if (p_half_side != NULL){
00926     *p_half_side = half_side;
00927   }
00928   if (p_center != NULL){
00929     position_Set_x(p_center, position_Get_x(&center));
00930     position_Set_y(p_center, position_Get_y(&center));
00931     position_Set_z(p_center, position_Get_z(&center));
00932   }
00933 }
00934 
00935 
00936 
00937 
00938 /*********************************************************************************************
00939    FMB_IO_Print_header
00940 *********************************************************************************************/
00941 void FMB_IO_Print_header(unsigned long step_counter /* only for FMB_ASCII_human_format, 
00942                                                      * but not very useful in fact... */,
00943                          bool only_position_and_value /* for FMB_binary_format header */,
00944                          bodies_ind_t nb_bodies,
00945                          position_t *p_center, 
00946                          COORDINATES_T half_side){
00947   
00948   if (! FMB_IO_Info.output_data_currently_used){
00949     FMB_error("In FMB_IO_Print_position(): FMB_IO_InitO() has not been called first.\n");
00950   }
00951   
00952   switch (FMB_IO_Info.output_format){
00953     
00954   case FMB_ASCII_format:
00955     /* Write 'nb_bodies': */
00956     FMB_IO_FPRINTF("%li\n", nb_bodies); 
00957     
00958     /* Write 'half_side' and octree center position: */
00959     FMB_IO_FPRINTF(LOW_PRECISION_DOUBLE_FPRINTF, half_side);
00960     FMB_IO_FPRINTF("\t");
00961     FMB_IO_Print_position(p_center, low);    
00962     FMB_IO_FPRINTF("\n");
00963     break;
00964 
00965   case FMB_ASCII_human_format:
00966     FMB_IO_FPRINTF("Step #%lu\n", step_counter);
00967 
00968     /* Write 'nb_bodies': */
00969     FMB_IO_FPRINTF("Nb bodies: %li\n", nb_bodies); 
00970 
00971     /* Write 'half_side' and octree center position: */
00972     FMB_IO_FPRINTF("Octree half side: ");
00973     FMB_IO_FPRINTF(LOW_PRECISION_DOUBLE_FPRINTF, half_side);
00974     FMB_IO_FPRINTF("\n");
00975     FMB_IO_FPRINTF("Octree center: ");
00976     FMB_IO_Print_position(p_center, low);    
00977     FMB_IO_FPRINTF("\n");
00978     break;
00979     
00980   case FMB_binary_format: {
00981     unsigned long header = 0;
00982     unsigned long magic_number = FMB_BINARY_FORMAT_MAGIC_NUMBER;
00983 
00984     /* Write the magic number: */
00985     /*     fprintf(f_output, "\t magic number = %lx \n", magic_number); */
00986     FMB_IO_Fwrite_ulong(magic_number);
00987     
00988     /* Set and write the header: */
00989     if (sizeof(COORDINATES_T) == sizeof(float)){
00990       header |= FMB_BINARY_FORMAT_HEADER_FLOAT_DATA_BIT;
00991     }
00992     if (only_position_and_value){
00993         header |= FMB_BINARY_FORMAT_HEADER_VALUE_PRESENCE_BIT;
00994         header |= FMB_BINARY_FORMAT_HEADER_POSITION_PRESENCE_BIT;
00995         FMB_IO_Info.FMB_binary_format_header = header;
00996     }
00997     else {
00998       if (FMB_IO_Info.input_format == FMB_binary_format){
00999         /* By default, we use the same "FMB binary format header" than 
01000          * in the input file (if the input file is in FMB binary format of course...). */
01001         header = FMB_IO_Info.FMB_binary_format_header;
01002       }
01003       else {
01004         /* Else, we write all fields except the "speed vector". */
01005         header |= FMB_BINARY_FORMAT_HEADER_VALUE_PRESENCE_BIT;
01006         header |= FMB_BINARY_FORMAT_HEADER_POSITION_PRESENCE_BIT;
01007         header |= FMB_BINARY_FORMAT_HEADER_FORCE_PRESENCE_BIT;
01008         /*    header |= FMB_BINARY_FORMAT_HEADER_SPEED_PRESENCE_BIT; */
01009         FMB_IO_Info.FMB_binary_format_header = header;
01010       }
01011     }
01012     //    fprintf(f_output, "FMB binary format header = %lx\n", header);
01013     FMB_IO_Fwrite_ulong(header);
01014     
01015     /* Write 'nb_bodies': */
01016     FMB_IO_FWRITE_BODIES_IND(nb_bodies); 
01017 
01018     /* Write 'half_side' and octree center position: */
01019     FMB_IO_FWRITE_COORDINATE(half_side);
01020     FMB_IO_FWRITE_COORDINATE(position_Get_x(p_center));
01021     FMB_IO_FWRITE_COORDINATE(position_Get_y(p_center));
01022     FMB_IO_FWRITE_COORDINATE(position_Get_z(p_center));
01023     break;
01024   }
01025     
01026   case NEMO_format:
01027     FMB_error("FMB_IO_Print_header() not implemented for NEMO format.\n");
01028     break;
01029  
01030   default:
01031     FMB_error("In FMB_IO_Print_header(): unknow file format.\n");
01032   }  
01033 
01034 }
01035 
01036 
01037 
01038 
01039 
01040 
01041 /*********************************************************************************************
01042    FMB_IO_Scan_body
01043 *********************************************************************************************/
01044 /* Get next body from the input data file and store it in '*p_body'.
01045  * We return '1' in case of success, 'O' if there was no more body to read (=> not done yet...). */ 
01046 int FMB_IO_Scan_body(body_t *p_body){
01047 
01048   if (! FMB_IO_Info.input_data_currently_used){
01049     FMB_error("In FMB_IO_Scan_body(): FMB_IO_InitI() has not been called first.\n");
01050   }
01051 
01052   switch (FMB_IO_Info.input_format){
01053     
01054   case FMB_ASCII_format:
01055 
01056       FMB_IO_FSCANF(NB_BYTES__FOR__NO_PRECISION_DOUBLE_FSCANF_X4, NO_PRECISION_DOUBLE_FSCANF_X4, 
01057                       position_Get_p_x(body_Get_p_position(p_body)), 
01058                       position_Get_p_y(body_Get_p_position(p_body)), 
01059                       position_Get_p_z(body_Get_p_position(p_body)), 
01060                       body_Get_p_value(p_body));
01061       break;
01062 
01063   case FMB_binary_format:
01064 
01065     if ((! FMB_BINARY_FORMAT_HEADER_IS_THE_BIT_SET(FMB_IO_Info.FMB_binary_format_header, 
01066                                                    FMB_BINARY_FORMAT_HEADER_POSITION_PRESENCE_BIT))
01067         || (! FMB_BINARY_FORMAT_HEADER_IS_THE_BIT_SET(FMB_IO_Info.FMB_binary_format_header, 
01068                                                       FMB_BINARY_FORMAT_HEADER_VALUE_PRESENCE_BIT))){
01069       FMB_error("In FMB_IO_Scan_body(): 'position' or 'value' is not present...");
01070     }
01071 
01072         
01073     if (FMB_BINARY_FORMAT_HEADER_IS_THE_BIT_SET(FMB_IO_Info.FMB_binary_format_header, FMB_BINARY_FORMAT_HEADER_FLOAT_DATA_BIT)){
01074       /*** The data in the input file are 'float'. ***/
01075       float  massf = 0.0; /* mass */
01076       float  xf = 0.0, yf = 0.0, zf = 0.0;    /* position */
01077       float unused;
01078 
01079       /* IMPORTANT: for now, we only read 'position' and 'value' from the input data file. */
01080       xf = FMB_IO_Fread_float(); 
01081       yf = FMB_IO_Fread_float();
01082       zf = FMB_IO_Fread_float();
01083       massf = FMB_IO_Fread_float();
01084       
01085       /* Skip the other field, if required: */
01086       if (FMB_BINARY_FORMAT_HEADER_IS_THE_BIT_SET(FMB_IO_Info.FMB_binary_format_header, 
01087                                                   FMB_BINARY_FORMAT_HEADER_POTENTIAL_PRESENCE_BIT)){
01088         unused = FMB_IO_Fread_float(); /* skip potential */
01089       }
01090       if (FMB_BINARY_FORMAT_HEADER_IS_THE_BIT_SET(FMB_IO_Info.FMB_binary_format_header, 
01091                                                   FMB_BINARY_FORMAT_HEADER_FORCE_PRESENCE_BIT)){
01092         unused = FMB_IO_Fread_float(); /* skip force vector */
01093         unused = FMB_IO_Fread_float();
01094         unused = FMB_IO_Fread_float();
01095       }
01096       if (FMB_BINARY_FORMAT_HEADER_IS_THE_BIT_SET(FMB_IO_Info.FMB_binary_format_header, 
01097                                                   FMB_BINARY_FORMAT_HEADER_SPEED_PRESENCE_BIT)){
01098         unused = FMB_IO_Fread_float(); /* skip speed vector */
01099         unused = FMB_IO_Fread_float();
01100         unused = FMB_IO_Fread_float();
01101       }
01102 
01103     /* Convert (if necessary) float/double to COORDINATES_T: */
01104       body_Set_value(p_body, (VALUES_T) massf);      
01105       position_Set_x(body_Get_p_position(p_body), (COORDINATES_T) xf);  
01106       position_Set_y(body_Get_p_position(p_body), (COORDINATES_T) yf);
01107       position_Set_z(body_Get_p_position(p_body), (COORDINATES_T) zf);
01108     }
01109     else {
01110       /*** The data in the input file are 'double'. ***/
01111       double massd = 0.0; /* mass */
01112       double xd = 0.0, yd = 0.0, zd = 0.0;    /* position */
01113       double unused;
01114 
01115       /* IMPORTANT: for now, we only read 'position' and 'value' from the input data file. */
01116       xd = FMB_IO_Fread_double(); 
01117       yd = FMB_IO_Fread_double();
01118       zd = FMB_IO_Fread_double();
01119       massd = FMB_IO_Fread_double();
01120       
01121       /* Skip the other field, if required: */
01122       if (FMB_BINARY_FORMAT_HEADER_IS_THE_BIT_SET(FMB_IO_Info.FMB_binary_format_header, 
01123                                                   FMB_BINARY_FORMAT_HEADER_POTENTIAL_PRESENCE_BIT)){
01124         unused = FMB_IO_Fread_double(); /* skip potential */
01125       }
01126       if (FMB_BINARY_FORMAT_HEADER_IS_THE_BIT_SET(FMB_IO_Info.FMB_binary_format_header, 
01127                                                   FMB_BINARY_FORMAT_HEADER_FORCE_PRESENCE_BIT)){
01128         unused = FMB_IO_Fread_double(); /* skip force vector */
01129         unused = FMB_IO_Fread_double();
01130         unused = FMB_IO_Fread_double();
01131       }
01132       if (FMB_BINARY_FORMAT_HEADER_IS_THE_BIT_SET(FMB_IO_Info.FMB_binary_format_header, 
01133                                                   FMB_BINARY_FORMAT_HEADER_SPEED_PRESENCE_BIT)){
01134         unused = FMB_IO_Fread_double(); /* skip speed vector */
01135         unused = FMB_IO_Fread_double();
01136         unused = FMB_IO_Fread_double();
01137       }
01138       
01139     /* Convert (if necessary) float/double to COORDINATES_T: */
01140       body_Set_value(p_body, (VALUES_T) massd);      
01141       position_Set_x(body_Get_p_position(p_body), (COORDINATES_T) xd);  
01142       position_Set_y(body_Get_p_position(p_body), (COORDINATES_T) yd);
01143       position_Set_z(body_Get_p_position(p_body), (COORDINATES_T) zd);
01144     }
01145     
01146     break;
01147 
01148   case NEMO_format: {
01149     float  massf = 0.0; /* mass */
01150     double massd = 0.0; /* mass */
01151     float  xf = 0.0, yf = 0.0, zf = 0.0;    /* position */
01152     double xd = 0.0, yd = 0.0, zd = 0.0;    /* position */
01153     float  vxf = 0.0, vyf = 0.0, vzf = 0.0; /* velocity */
01154     double vxd = 0.0, vyd = 0.0, vzd = 0.0; /* velocity */
01155 
01156     /* Retrieve mass: */
01157     if (FMB_IO_Info.is_input_coord_float){
01158       get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data, "Mass", &massf, 1); 
01159       body_Set_value(p_body, (VALUES_T) massf);      
01160     }
01161     else {
01162       get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data, "Mass", &massd, 1); 
01163       body_Set_value(p_body, (VALUES_T) massd);      
01164     }
01165 
01166     /* Retrieve PhaseSpace (or position and velocity): */
01167     if (FMB_IO_Info.use_PhaseSpace_in_input){
01168       if (FMB_IO_Info.is_input_coord_float){
01169         get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2, "PhaseSpace", &xf, 1); 
01170         get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2, "PhaseSpace", &yf, 1); 
01171         get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2, "PhaseSpace", &zf, 1); 
01172         get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2, "PhaseSpace", &vxf, 1); 
01173         get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2, "PhaseSpace", &vyf, 1); 
01174         get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2, "PhaseSpace", &vzf, 1); 
01175       }
01176       else {
01177         get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2, "PhaseSpace", &xd, 1); 
01178         get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2, "PhaseSpace", &yd, 1); 
01179         get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2, "PhaseSpace", &zd, 1); 
01180         get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2, "PhaseSpace", &vxd, 1); 
01181         get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2, "PhaseSpace", &vyd, 1); 
01182         get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2, "PhaseSpace", &vzd, 1); 
01183       }
01184     }
01185     else {
01186       if (FMB_IO_Info.is_input_coord_float){
01187         get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2, "Position", &xf, 1); 
01188         get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2, "Position", &yf, 1); 
01189         get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2, "Position", &zf, 1); 
01190         if (FMB_IO_Info.is_Velocity_present_in_input){
01191           get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data3, "Velocity", &vxf, 1); 
01192           get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data3, "Velocity", &vyf, 1); 
01193           get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data3, "Velocity", &vzf, 1); 
01194         }
01195       }
01196       else {
01197         get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2, "Position", &xd, 1); 
01198         get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2, "Position", &yd, 1); 
01199         get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data2, "Position", &zd, 1); 
01200         if (FMB_IO_Info.is_Velocity_present_in_input){
01201           get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data3, "Velocity", &vxd, 1); 
01202           get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data3, "Velocity", &vyd, 1); 
01203           get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data3, "Velocity", &vzd, 1); 
01204         }
01205       }
01206     }
01207     
01208     /* Convert (if necessary) float/double to COORDINATES_T: */
01209     if (FMB_IO_Info.is_input_coord_float){
01210       position_Set_x(body_Get_p_position(p_body), (COORDINATES_T) xf);  
01211       position_Set_y(body_Get_p_position(p_body), (COORDINATES_T) yf);
01212       position_Set_z(body_Get_p_position(p_body), (COORDINATES_T) zf);
01213       position_Set_x(body_Get_p_speed_vector(p_body), (COORDINATES_T) vxf);     
01214       position_Set_y(body_Get_p_speed_vector(p_body), (COORDINATES_T) vyf);
01215       position_Set_z(body_Get_p_speed_vector(p_body), (COORDINATES_T) vzf);
01216     }
01217     else {
01218       position_Set_x(body_Get_p_position(p_body), (COORDINATES_T) xd);  
01219       position_Set_y(body_Get_p_position(p_body), (COORDINATES_T) yd);
01220       position_Set_z(body_Get_p_position(p_body), (COORDINATES_T) zd);
01221       position_Set_x(body_Get_p_speed_vector(p_body), (COORDINATES_T) vxd);     
01222       position_Set_y(body_Get_p_speed_vector(p_body), (COORDINATES_T) vyd);
01223       position_Set_z(body_Get_p_speed_vector(p_body), (COORDINATES_T) vzd);
01224     }
01225     
01226     /* Retrieve Forces (if they are present): */
01227     if (FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data_forces != NULL){
01228       float  xf = 0.0, yf = 0.0, zf = 0.0;    
01229       double xd = 0.0, yd = 0.0, zd = 0.0;    
01230 
01231       if (FMB_IO_Info.is_input_coord_float){
01232         get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data_forces, "Acceleration", &xf, 1); 
01233         get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data_forces, "Acceleration", &yf, 1); 
01234         get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data_forces, "Acceleration", &zf, 1); 
01235 
01236         /* Convert (if necessary) float/double to COORDINATES_T: */
01237         position_Set_x(body_Get_p_force_vector(p_body), (COORDINATES_T) xf * body_Get_value(p_body));   
01238         position_Set_y(body_Get_p_force_vector(p_body), (COORDINATES_T) yf * body_Get_value(p_body));
01239         position_Set_z(body_Get_p_force_vector(p_body), (COORDINATES_T) zf * body_Get_value(p_body));
01240       }
01241       else {
01242         get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data_forces, "Acceleration", &xd, 1); 
01243         get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data_forces, "Acceleration", &yd, 1); 
01244         get_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_input_data_forces, "Acceleration", &zd, 1); 
01245         
01246         /* Convert (if necessary) float/double to COORDINATES_T: */
01247         position_Set_x(body_Get_p_force_vector(p_body), (COORDINATES_T) xd * body_Get_value(p_body));   
01248         position_Set_y(body_Get_p_force_vector(p_body), (COORDINATES_T) yd * body_Get_value(p_body));
01249         position_Set_z(body_Get_p_force_vector(p_body), (COORDINATES_T) zd * body_Get_value(p_body));
01250       }
01251     }
01252 
01253     break;
01254   }
01255   default:
01256     FMB_error("In FMB_IO_Scan_body(): unknow file format.\n");
01257   }
01258 
01259   return 1; 
01260 }
01261

01267 /*********************************************************************************************
01268    FMB_IO_Print_position
01269 *********************************************************************************************/
01270 /* Write the position in the output data file. */ 
01271 void FMB_IO_Print_position(position_t *FMB_RESTRICT p,  
01272                            precision_double_t prec /* only for 'FMB_ASCII_format'
01273                                                     * and 'FMB_ASCII_human_format' */){
01274   FMB_IO_Print_pos_xyz(position_Get_x(p),
01275                        position_Get_y(p),
01276                        position_Get_z(p),
01277                        prec);
01278 
01279 }

01284 /*********************************************************************************************
01285    FMB_IO_Print_pos_xyz
01286 *********************************************************************************************/
01287 /* Write the position in the output data file. */ 
01288 void FMB_IO_Print_pos_xyz(COORDINATES_T pos_x,
01289                           COORDINATES_T pos_y,
01290                           COORDINATES_T pos_z,
01291                           precision_double_t prec /* only for 'FMB_ASCII_format'
01292                                                     * and 'FMB_ASCII_human_format' */){
01293 
01294   if (! FMB_IO_Info.output_data_currently_used){
01295     FMB_error("In FMB_IO_Print_position(): FMB_IO_InitO() has not been called first.\n");
01296   }
01297 
01298   switch (FMB_IO_Info.output_format){
01299     
01300   case FMB_ASCII_format: 
01301     
01302     if (prec == low){
01303       FMB_IO_FPRINTF(LOW_PRECISION_DOUBLE_FPRINTF, pos_x);
01304       FMB_IO_FPRINTF("\t");
01305       FMB_IO_FPRINTF(LOW_PRECISION_DOUBLE_FPRINTF, pos_y);
01306       FMB_IO_FPRINTF("\t");
01307       FMB_IO_FPRINTF(LOW_PRECISION_DOUBLE_FPRINTF, pos_z);
01308     }
01309     else {
01310       FMB_IO_FPRINTF(HIGH_PRECISION_DOUBLE_FPRINTF, pos_x);
01311       FMB_IO_FPRINTF("\t");
01312       FMB_IO_FPRINTF(HIGH_PRECISION_DOUBLE_FPRINTF, pos_y);
01313       FMB_IO_FPRINTF("\t");
01314       FMB_IO_FPRINTF(HIGH_PRECISION_DOUBLE_FPRINTF, pos_z);
01315     }
01316   
01317     break;
01318 
01319   case FMB_ASCII_human_format: 
01320     FMB_IO_FPRINTF("(");
01321     
01322     if (prec == low){
01323       FMB_IO_FPRINTF(LOW_PRECISION_DOUBLE_FPRINTF, pos_x);
01324       FMB_IO_FPRINTF(", ");
01325       FMB_IO_FPRINTF(LOW_PRECISION_DOUBLE_FPRINTF, pos_y);
01326       FMB_IO_FPRINTF(", ");
01327       FMB_IO_FPRINTF(LOW_PRECISION_DOUBLE_FPRINTF, pos_z);
01328     }
01329     else {
01330       FMB_IO_FPRINTF(HIGH_PRECISION_DOUBLE_FPRINTF, pos_x);
01331       FMB_IO_FPRINTF(", ");
01332       FMB_IO_FPRINTF(HIGH_PRECISION_DOUBLE_FPRINTF, pos_y);
01333       FMB_IO_FPRINTF(", ");
01334       FMB_IO_FPRINTF(HIGH_PRECISION_DOUBLE_FPRINTF, pos_z);
01335     }
01336   
01337     FMB_IO_FPRINTF(")");
01338     break;
01339     
01340   case FMB_binary_format: 
01341     FMB_IO_FWRITE_COORDINATE(pos_x);
01342     FMB_IO_FWRITE_COORDINATE(pos_y);
01343     FMB_IO_FWRITE_COORDINATE(pos_z);
01344     break;
01345 
01346   case NEMO_format:
01347     FMB_error("FMB_IO_Print_position() not implemented for NEMO format.\n");
01348 
01349   default:
01350     FMB_error("In FMB_IO_Print_position(): unknow file format.\n");
01351   }
01352 }
01353

01360 
01361 /*********************************************************************************************
01362    FMB_IO_Print_body_fields
01363 *********************************************************************************************/
01364 /* Internal function. */ 
01365 void FMB_IO_Print_body_fields(COORDINATES_T pos_x,
01366                               COORDINATES_T pos_y,
01367                               COORDINATES_T pos_z,
01368                               VALUES_T value,
01369                               COORDINATES_T fx, 
01370                               COORDINATES_T fy, 
01371                               COORDINATES_T fz,
01372                               position_t *p_speed_vector,
01373                               bool only_position_and_value){
01374   
01375   if (! FMB_IO_Info.output_data_currently_used){
01376     FMB_error("In FMB_IO_Print_body_fields(): FMB_IO_InitO() has not been called first.\n");
01377   }
01378 
01379   switch (FMB_IO_Info.output_format){
01380     
01381   case FMB_ASCII_format: 
01382     if (only_position_and_value){
01383     /* WARNING: we only print here the "position" and "value" of the body,
01384      * so that we can use this in 'FMB_proc_Dump_proc_decomposition()'. */
01385     /* WARNING #2: we use '%e' (and not '%f') for cosmological distributions! */
01386     FMB_IO_FPRINTF("%e\t%e\t%e\t%e\n", 
01387                    pos_x,
01388                    pos_y,
01389                    pos_z,
01390                    value);
01391     }
01392     else {
01393       FMB_IO_Print_pos_xyz(pos_x, pos_y, pos_z, low);
01394       FMB_IO_FPRINTF("\t");
01395       FMB_IO_FPRINTF(LOW_PRECISION_DOUBLE_FPRINTF, value);
01396       FMB_IO_FPRINTF("\t");
01397       FMB_IO_Print_pos_xyz(fx, fy, fz, high);
01398       /*  FMB_IO_FPRINTF("\t"); */
01399       /*  FMB_IO_Print_position(p_speed_vector, high); */
01400       FMB_IO_FPRINTF("\n");
01401     }
01402     break;
01403 
01404   case FMB_ASCII_human_format: 
01405     FMB_IO_FPRINTF("*** pos= ");
01406     FMB_IO_Print_pos_xyz(pos_x, pos_y, pos_z, low);
01407     FMB_IO_FPRINTF("\tv= ");
01408     FMB_IO_FPRINTF(LOW_PRECISION_DOUBLE_FPRINTF, value);
01409     if (! only_position_and_value){
01410       FMB_IO_FPRINTF("\t\t");
01411       FMB_IO_FPRINTF("\t\t\t\t\t\tforce= ");
01412       FMB_IO_Print_pos_xyz(fx, fy, fz, high);
01413       /*  FMB_IO_FPRINTF("\tspeed="); */
01414       /*  FMB_IO_Print_position(p_speed_vector, high); */
01415     }
01416     FMB_IO_FPRINTF("\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\n");
01417     break;
01418 
01419   case FMB_binary_format: 
01420     /* 'only_position_and_value' should have already been used in 'FMB_IO_Print_header()'. */
01421     if (FMB_BINARY_FORMAT_HEADER_IS_THE_BIT_SET(FMB_IO_Info.FMB_binary_format_header, FMB_BINARY_FORMAT_HEADER_POSITION_PRESENCE_BIT)){
01422       FMB_IO_Print_pos_xyz(pos_x, pos_y, pos_z, low /* unused with FMB_binary_format */);
01423     }
01424     if (FMB_BINARY_FORMAT_HEADER_IS_THE_BIT_SET(FMB_IO_Info.FMB_binary_format_header, FMB_BINARY_FORMAT_HEADER_VALUE_PRESENCE_BIT)){
01425       FMB_IO_FWRITE_VALUE(value);
01426     }
01427     if (FMB_BINARY_FORMAT_HEADER_IS_THE_BIT_SET(FMB_IO_Info.FMB_binary_format_header, FMB_BINARY_FORMAT_HEADER_FORCE_PRESENCE_BIT)){
01428       FMB_IO_Print_pos_xyz(fx, fy, fz, high /* unused with FMB_binary_format */);
01429     }
01430     if (FMB_BINARY_FORMAT_HEADER_IS_THE_BIT_SET(FMB_IO_Info.FMB_binary_format_header, FMB_BINARY_FORMAT_HEADER_SPEED_PRESENCE_BIT)){
01431       FMB_IO_Print_position(p_speed_vector, high /* unused with FMB_binary_format */);
01432     }
01433     break;
01434     
01435   case NEMO_format:
01436     FMB_error("FMB_IO_Print_body_fields() not implemented for NEMO format.\n");
01437     
01438   default:
01439     FMB_error("In FMB_IO_Print_body_fields(): unknow file format.\n");
01440   }
01441 }
01442 
01443

01448 /*********************************************************************************************
01449    FMB_IO_Print_body
01450 *********************************************************************************************/
01451 /* Write the body in the output data file. */ 
01452 void FMB_IO_Print_body(body_t *p_body,
01453                        bool only_position_and_value){
01454 
01455   if (! FMB_IO_Info.output_data_currently_used){
01456     FMB_error("In FMB_IO_Print_body(): FMB_IO_InitO() has not been called first.\n");
01457   }
01458 
01459   switch (FMB_IO_Info.output_format){
01460     
01461   case FMB_ASCII_format: 
01462   case FMB_ASCII_human_format: 
01463   case FMB_binary_format:
01464     FMB_IO_Print_body_fields(position_Get_x(body_Get_p_position(p_body)),
01465                              position_Get_y(body_Get_p_position(p_body)),
01466                              position_Get_z(body_Get_p_position(p_body)),
01467                              body_Get_value(p_body),
01468                              position_Get_x(body_Get_p_force_vector(p_body)),
01469                              position_Get_y(body_Get_p_force_vector(p_body)),
01470                              position_Get_z(body_Get_p_force_vector(p_body)),
01471                              body_Get_p_speed_vector(p_body),
01472                              only_position_and_value);
01473     break;
01474     
01475   case NEMO_format:
01476     FMB_error("FMB_IO_Print_body() not implemented for NEMO format.\n");
01477 
01478   default:
01479     FMB_error("In FMB_IO_Print_body(): unknow file format.\n");
01480   }
01481 }

01490 /*********************************************************************************************
01491    FMB_IO_Print_body_from_bodies_it
01492 *********************************************************************************************/
01493 /* Write the next body into 'p_i' in the output data file. */ 
01494 void FMB_IO_Print_body_from_bodies_it(bodies_it_t *p_i,
01495                                       bool only_position_and_value){
01496 
01497   if (! FMB_IO_Info.output_data_currently_used){
01498     FMB_error("In FMB_IO_Print_body_from_bodies_it(): FMB_IO_InitO() has not been called first.\n");
01499   }
01500 
01501   switch (FMB_IO_Info.output_format){
01502     
01503   case FMB_ASCII_format: 
01504   case FMB_ASCII_human_format: 
01505   case FMB_binary_format:
01506  FMB_IO_Print_body_fields(bodies_it_Get_pos_x(p_i),
01507                            bodies_it_Get_pos_y(p_i),
01508                            bodies_it_Get_pos_z(p_i),
01509                            bodies_it_Get_value(p_i),
01510                            bodies_it_Get_fx(p_i),
01511                            bodies_it_Get_fy(p_i),
01512                            bodies_it_Get_fz(p_i),
01513                            bodies_it_Get_p_speed_vector(p_i), 
01514                            only_position_and_value);
01515     break;
01516     
01517   case NEMO_format:
01518     FMB_error("FMB_IO_Print_body_from_bodies_it() not implemented for NEMO format.\n");
01519 
01520   default:
01521     FMB_error("In FMB_IO_Print_body_from_bodies_it(): unknow file format.\n");
01522   }
01523 }

01534 /*********************************************************************************************
01535    FMB_IO_Print_all_bodies_from_bodies_t
01536 *********************************************************************************************/
01537 /* Write all the bodies of the 'bodies_t' variable in the output data file. 
01538  * Only for NEMO format. */ 
01539 void FMB_IO_Print_all_bodies_from_bodies_t(bodies_t *p_bodies){
01540 
01541   if (! FMB_IO_Info.output_data_currently_used){
01542     FMB_error("In FMB_IO_Print_all_bodies_from_bodies_t(): FMB_IO_InitO() has not been called first.\n");
01543   }
01544 
01545   switch (FMB_IO_Info.output_format){
01546     
01547   case FMB_ASCII_format: 
01548   case FMB_ASCII_human_format: 
01549   case FMB_binary_format: 
01550     FMB_error("FMB_IO_Print_all_bodies_from_bodies_t() not implemented for the FMB formats.\n");
01551     break;
01552 
01553     
01554   case NEMO_format: {
01555     bodies_it_t it;
01556     bodies_ind_t nb_bodies = bodies_Nb_bodies(p_bodies);
01557 
01558 #define MaxVecDim 9 /* value of 'MaxVecDim' in nemo */
01559     int i=0, nobj = 0, dims[MaxVecDim];
01560     double time = 0.0;
01561 /*     int coordsystem = 66306; /\* dummy value... *\/ */
01562 
01563     /* Set dims[] to 0: */
01564     for (i=0; i<MaxVecDim; i++){  dims[i] = 0; }
01565 
01566     /*** Set snapshot: ***/
01567     put_set((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_output_data, "SnapShot");
01568     
01569     /*** Set header: ***/
01570     put_set((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_output_data, "Parameters");      
01571     put_data_sub((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_output_data, "Time", (FMB_IO_Info.is_output_coord_float ? "f" : "d"), (void *)&time, dims, 0);
01572     nobj = (int) nb_bodies;
01573     put_data_sub((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_output_data, "Nobj", "i", (void *)&nobj, dims, 0);
01574     put_tes((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_output_data, "Parameters");      
01575     
01576     /*** Set data: *** 
01577      * we write here one body at a time thanks to 'put_data_blocked()' 
01578      * (we write first all masses, then all Position, etc., which implies several passes on the octree,
01579      * but I don't think it is possible to have just one pass (with several streams): it was possible on reading,
01580      * but much harder on writing (I would need to know exactly how much to skip with lseek() to correctly set 
01581      * the different streams...)) */
01582     put_set((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_output_data, "Particles");      
01583 /*     put_data_sub((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_output_data, "CoordSystem", "i", (void *)&coordsystem, dims, 0); */
01584       
01585 
01586     /*** Mass ***/
01587     put_data_set((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_output_data, "Mass", (FMB_IO_Info.is_output_coord_float ? "f" : "d"), nb_bodies, 0);       
01588     for (bodies_it_Initialize(&it, p_bodies);
01589          bodies_it_Is_valid(&it);
01590          bodies_it_Go2Next(&it)){
01591       put_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_output_data, "Mass", (void *) bodies_it_Get_p_value(&it), 1);       
01592     }
01593     put_data_tes((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_output_data, "Mass");
01594     
01595 
01596     if (FMB_IO_Info.use_PhaseSpace_in_output){
01597 
01598       /*** PhaseSpace ***/
01599       put_data_set((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_output_data, "PhaseSpace", (FMB_IO_Info.is_output_coord_float ? "f" : "d"), nb_bodies, 2, 3, 0);
01600       for (bodies_it_Initialize(&it, p_bodies);
01601            bodies_it_Is_valid(&it);
01602            bodies_it_Go2Next(&it)){
01603         position_t pos;
01604         position_Set_x(&pos, bodies_it_Get_pos_x(&it));
01605         position_Set_y(&pos, bodies_it_Get_pos_y(&it));
01606         position_Set_z(&pos, bodies_it_Get_pos_z(&it));
01607 
01608         put_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_output_data, "PhaseSpace", (void *)&pos, 3);      
01609         put_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_output_data, "PhaseSpace", (void *)bodies_it_Get_p_speed_vector(&it), 3);         
01610       }
01611       put_data_tes((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_output_data, "PhaseSpace");
01612 
01613     } /* if (FMB_IO_Info.use_PhaseSpace_in_output) */
01614     else {
01615 
01616       /*** Position ***/
01617       put_data_set((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_output_data, "Position", (FMB_IO_Info.is_output_coord_float ? "f" : "d"), nb_bodies, 1, 3, 0);
01618       for (bodies_it_Initialize(&it, p_bodies);
01619            bodies_it_Is_valid(&it);
01620            bodies_it_Go2Next(&it)){
01621             position_t pos;
01622             position_Set_x(&pos, bodies_it_Get_pos_x(&it));
01623             position_Set_y(&pos, bodies_it_Get_pos_y(&it));
01624             position_Set_z(&pos, bodies_it_Get_pos_z(&it));
01625 
01626             put_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_output_data, "Position", (void *)&pos, 3);    
01627       }
01628       put_data_tes((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_output_data, "Position");
01629       
01630       /*** Velocity ***/
01631       put_data_set((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_output_data, "Velocity", (FMB_IO_Info.is_output_coord_float ? "f" : "d"), nb_bodies, 1, 3, 0);
01632       for (bodies_it_Initialize(&it, p_bodies);
01633            bodies_it_Is_valid(&it);
01634            bodies_it_Go2Next(&it)){
01635         put_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_output_data, "Velocity", (void *)bodies_it_Get_p_speed_vector(&it), 3);   
01636       }
01637       put_data_tes((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_output_data, "Velocity");
01638       
01639     } /* else (FMB_IO_Info.use_PhaseSpace_in_output) */
01640 
01641     
01642 
01643     /*** Accelerations ***/
01644     /* I assume here: accelerations = forces / mass */
01645     put_data_set((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_output_data, "Acceleration", (FMB_IO_Info.is_output_coord_float ? "f" : "d"), nb_bodies, 1, 3, 0);       
01646     for (bodies_it_Initialize(&it, p_bodies);
01647          bodies_it_Is_valid(&it);
01648          bodies_it_Go2Next(&it)){
01649       position_t acc;
01650       position_Set_x(&acc, bodies_it_Get_fx(&it));
01651       position_Set_y(&acc, bodies_it_Get_fy(&it));
01652       position_Set_z(&acc, bodies_it_Get_fz(&it));
01653       position_Mult_by_real(&acc, (REAL_T) 1/bodies_it_Get_value(&it));
01654       put_data_blocked((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_output_data, "Acceleration", (void *)&acc, 3);      
01655     }
01656     put_data_tes((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_output_data, "Acceleration");
01657     
01658     /* tes (Particles): */
01659     put_tes((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_output_data, "Particles");      
01660     
01661     /* tes (Snapshot): */
01662     put_tes((stream) FMB_IO_Info.f_output_data, "SnapShot");
01663     
01664 #undef MaxVecDim
01665     break;
01666   }
01667     
01668   default:
01669     FMB_error("In FMB_IO_Print_all_bodies_from_bodies_t(): unknow file format.\n");
01670   }
01671 }
01672

01682 /*********************************************************************************************
01683 **********************************************************************************************
01684 
01685    b[un]zip2_file 
01686 
01687 **********************************************************************************************
01688 *********************************************************************************************/
01689 
01690 void bunzip2_file(const char *filename){
01691   /* bunzip2_file() is used for "data_file": */
01692   char *decompression_command = (char *) FMB_malloc_with_check(strlen(filename) + 1 + BZIP2_DECOMPRESSOR_LENGTH);
01693   strcpy(decompression_command, BZIP2_DECOMPRESSOR);
01694   strcat(decompression_command, " ");
01695   strcat(decompression_command, filename);
01696   strcat(decompression_command, BZIP2_COMPRESSION_SUFFIX);
01697   if (system(decompression_command) == -1){ FMB_ERROR_BRIEF(); }
01698   FMB_free(decompression_command);
01699 }
01700 
01701 
01702 void bzip2_file(const char *filename){
01703   /* bzip2_file() is used for "data_file": */
01704   char *compression_command = (char *) FMB_malloc_with_check(strlen(filename) + 1 + BZIP2_COMPRESSOR_LENGTH);
01705   strcpy(compression_command, BZIP2_COMPRESSOR);
01706   strcat(compression_command, " ");
01707   strcat(compression_command, filename);
01708   if (system(compression_command) == -1){ FMB_ERROR_BRIEF(); }
01709   FMB_free(compression_command);
01710 }
